title: cannot connect to server
body: this is the first time this has happened to me since i started playing league in season 2. in the log-in screen where i type in my username and password after i put them and click enter it says that the login server has not responded. i dont know what to do, it was working just fine last night and when i wake up to try and play this keeps happening. when i click the support links it also says that they arent actually there. it gives me a blank page. if anyone can help me with this i would be very greatful!

replies.body: Happening to everyone right now, it's good you posted it though, if everyone keeps complaining maybe something will actually happen
I have been having a similar issue, but instead the server is just not responding. I updated my firewall, uninstalled pando, restarted the computer, etc etc and nothing is working. Help?
just checked to see if anything changed and i still cant log in either =/

Things are finally working for me, even though I did nothing to directly fix the issue. Maestro had a problem at some point, and I got three bugsplats in one! A friend went through the same process. I have no idea what happened or why. Good luck man.
ya i got the bugsplats earlier but still wont let me log in
for the last week i couldnt play league cause of the same problem and still it refuses to work im so pissed off because of that{{champion:62}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3340}}

Hey everyone,

Once you hit the Login screen and enter your credentials and attempt to login, your computer needs to connect to our login Server, and subsequently connect to PvP.net (the client).  Our Login server is not only responsible for ensuring that your Username and Password match, but also confirm the proper security certificates to your computer.  If your computer rejects the security certificates from our server, you will experience errors such as this.  These same errors will also occur if your connection is unstable or if you have security software that is blocking this connection ( either to the login servers or PvP.net).

Make sure to try following the steps in this Knowledge Base Article, it should help in getting you into the client!

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/234161-Login-Issues

If you are still unable to sign-in and take to Rift with your friends, then don't give up!  Make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) to us in Player Support where we can investigate your issue further, and provide some additional solutions.  If you do submit a ticket, make sure to include the following:

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3

None of this has worked for me, I tried everything on the list. I have sent a support ticket and only got an automated msg asking for a picture, which I did send. I am at a loss at this point. It has been 4 days since I have last been able to log in, and I have no Idea what the problem is or how to fix it.

Thank you, Thanks to this information i was able to figure out, what was wrong. Due to this information, I have noticed that Internet explorer was not connecting to websites even though my Firefox could. With a little of digging around, i was able to figure out that it my Norton Internet Security blocking the connection. I used the [removal and reinstall tool ](https://support.norton.com/sp/en/us/home/current/solutions/v60392881_EndUserProfile_en_us)that they have to fix the problem.

I woke up early to play League of Legends and it's telling me server is busy try again later......really? Why is this type of stuff a constant issue. I'm pretty tired of not being able to play. I'd be willing to pay a subscription if I could play without being constantly locked out of the game >.< fffffff{{champion:103}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:134}}
was able to log in now, dont know what happened nothing changed.
